agency_of_advice.evidence: Break tasks into smaller steps and celebrate small wins. Prioritize sleep, hydration and balance nutrition. Mindfulness or journaling can help you identify patterns and reduce mental clutter. Talk to someone you trust or a professional for support.

improvement_vs_retreat.evidence: By tackling one thing at a time, you can build clarity and confidence step by step.
